column4: it's usplash (the graphical boot screen) that doesn't seem to like your video card. Quick and dirty fix: disable it altogether :p
sorry. should i uninstall the gdm?
hmmm, hold on, when exactly do you see those stripes?
when the booter almost are finished, and i should be presented with the login. also the sound activates just before the "stripes"
i think i have a ati hd2400 xtx
Number of created screens does not match number of detected devices. configuration failed
do you have multiple monitors or stuff like that?
yes, but only one is connected
in the new xorg.conf.new that was generated, there are 35 monitors specified there....
sorry, had to run off for a bit, still needing help with your Xorg ?
